signature_matches.description: Checks if a SIM card is installed
Queries the SIM provider numeric MCC+MNC (mobile country code + mobile network code)
Has permission to query the current location
Queries if audio routing to the Bluetooth headset is enabled
Queries the SIM provider name (SPN - Service Provider Name)
Has permission to read the SMS storage
Installs a new wake lock (to get activate on phone screen on)
Uses WebRTC (often used for remote VNC)
Tries to detect the analysis device (e.g. the Android emulator)
Checks an internet connection is available
Checks if phone is rooted (checks for su binary)
match_data: "/system/bin/", "su" and API call "File.exists" in same context

signature_matches.description: Removes its application launcher (likely to stay hidden)
Has permission to record audio in the background
Checks if phone is rooted (checks for test-keys build tags)
Has permission to perform phone calls in the background
Unable to instrument or execute APK, no dynamic information has been logged
Registers a clipboard change listener (to get access to clipboard data)
May access the Android keyguard (lock screen)
Might try to detect if ADB is running
Has permissions to create, read or change account settings (inlcuding account password settings)
Registers a Sensor listener (to get data about accelerometer, gyrometer etc.)
Lists and deletes files in the same context
Queries a list of installed applications
Uses HTTP for connecting to the internet
Uses DownloadManager to fetch additional components
Queries the network operator ISO country code
Has functionality to send UDP packets
Has functionalty to add an overlay to other apps
Has permission to draw over other applications or user interfaces
Queries stored mail and application accounts (e.g. Gmail or Whatsup)
Queries the unqiue device ID (IMEI, MEID or ESN)
Has permission to read the phones state (phone number, device IDs, active call ect.)
URLs found in memory or binary data
Has permission to read the call log
Queries the SIM provider ISO country code
Might use exploit to break dedexer tools
Reads boot loader settings of the device
Installs an application shortcut on the screen
Queries the network operator numeric MCC+MNC (mobile country code + mobile network code)
May try to detect the virtual machine to hinder analysis (VM artifact strings found in memory)

signature_matches.description: Has permission to send SMS in the background
Queries the unique operating system id (ANDROID_ID)
Sets an intent to the APK data type (used to install other APKs)
Reads the serial number of the device
Has permission to execute code after phone reboot

ids_alerts.rule_raw: alert ( gid:116; sid:424; rev:2; msg:"(eth) truncated ethernet header"; metadata: policy max-detect-ips drop, rule-type decode; classtype:misc-activity;)

ids_alerts.rule_msg: SURICATA STREAM SHUTDOWN RST invalid ack
ids_alerts.rule_raw: alert tcp any any -> any any (msg:"SURICATA STREAM SHUTDOWN RST invalid ack"; stream-event:rst_invalid_ack; classtype:protocol-command-decode; sid:2210046; rev:2;)

ids_alerts.rule_msg: ET POLICY Possible External IP Lookup Domain Observed in SNI (ipinfo. io)
ids_alerts.rule_category: Device Retrieving External IP Address Detected
ids_alerts.rule_raw: alert tls $HOME_NET any -> $EXTERNAL_NET 443 (msg:"ET POLICY Possible External IP Lookup Domain Observed in SNI (ipinfo. io)"; flow:established,to_server; tls.sni; content:"ipinfo.io"; bsize:9; fast_pattern; classtype:external-ip-check; sid:2025331; rev:5; metadata:affected_product Windows_XP_Vista_7_8_10_Server_32_64_Bit, affected_product Mac_OSX, affected_product Linux, attack_target Client_Endpoint, created_at 2018_02_07, deployment Perimeter, performance_impact Low, confidence High, signature_severity Informational, updated_at 2024_09_19;)
